item.title: DAVID IGNATIUS
item.description:
www.washingtonpost.com
David Ignatius writes a twice-a-week foreign affairs column.

item.title: UPDATE: 22 MILLION ILLEGALS IN USA, NOT 11 MILLION!
item.description:
www.washingtonexaminer.com
President Trump’s top immigration spokesman on Wednesday said that there are potentially 22 million illegal immigrants inside the United States, nearly twice the estimate regularly cited.

item.title: BREXIT-EU DEAL REACHED!

item.title: Inside America's First Cannabis Cafe...
item.description:
www.thedailybeast.com
America’s first cannabis cafe, a place where you can get high and eat at the same time, has opened in L.A. Here’s everything you need to know.

item.title: Porn actor accused of sexual assault by over two dozen women...
item.description:
www.thedailybeast.com
Adult site Girls Do Porn allegedly conned poor women into performing XXX fare. And its actor, Andre Garcia, stands accused of sexually assaulting many of them, court records show.

item.title: STUDY: Relaxation Techniques Cause Many To Feel Worse!
item.description:
www.studyfinds.org
A new study finds that anxious people may choose not to relax in fear that shedding their worries will result in even more anxiety if something bad happens.

item.title: Warren, Sanders drive anti-billionaire shift for Dems...
